title: Bancroft Immortal
description: Aubrey Hunter knows immortals are not vampires, demons, gods or ghosts. She has dreamt of them her whole life, caught between her world and theirs, watching but never belonging.Until the peculiar scent of burning wood and cinnamon floods her senses and a very real Ephraim, the immortal who most fills her dreams, is standing in front of her.Civil War is raging throughout the immortal world as two immortal councils fight for power, each claiming the other would destroy mankind. Each Council has an immortal brother, and Aubrey Hunter becomes the sole focus of both Ephraim and Xavier Bancroft, although for very different reasons: one wants to protect her, and one wants her dead. She is the first female Watch, and she is destined to determine the victor of the immortal Civil War.
author: Katy Doucette
